title: Lol Client wont launch properly
body: Usually when I double click the league shortcut, and hit the orange Launch button, it goes gray then just back to orange and does nothing. I've went into the folders and opened the admin launcher; it goes through but the alpha loading screen never goes anywhere. I've left it on the loading screen for hours and it never changes. I tried uninstalling and reinstalling the game, but it didn't help. Is there anything I can do to fix this?

replies.body:
It sounds like your connection to our login servers is unstable, causing the symptoms you're seeing. This usually happens as a result of incompatible network settings that our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) should help resolve.

If you continue to experience these symptoms after taking those steps, let me know.
Every now and then i can get it to work, but never when I want it to.
